ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello All
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Tina: It is nice to see a fellow Torontonian here, and T.O. is indeed a great city. I have already started a character on Rodcet and had him inducted into
ygData.messageBody:
Christina Norman wrote:

> Hey Vince, I'm also from Toronto, small world...great city! =D Maybe I'll
> see you online some time.
>
> You can always try making a character on Rodcet, and you don't have to
> give up your Tribunal characters. It will become clear with a little bit
> of playing which server you prefer =)
>
> Tina
>

Tina:

It is nice to see a fellow Torontonian here, and T.O. is indeed a great city.
I have already started a character on Rodcet and had him inducted into the
Mystic Alliance. First of all, let me say that the people I have met from MA
have been absolutely great to me, very welcoming and helpful...all that I
could wish for in a guild, and the guildsays are now the highlight of my
playing sessions. The server in general I find also has a friendliness that
the Tribunal sometimes lacks, although I haven't yet met enough non-guild
players to really say if this is a trend or merely luck. So far, I have not
regretted switching to RN and playing there, and I seriously doubt that I ever
will.

If you ever see my cleric, Kythwin, online be sure to wave to him!

Vince
Kythwin, Cleric of Tunare, 6th Circle
